name: Rain in Australia
data_intro: This dataset comprises about 10 years of daily weather observations from numerous locations across Australia.

cat_feature_intro.Location: This dataset comprises about 10 years of daily weather observations from numerous locations across Australia.
cat_feature_intro.RainTomorrow: **RainTomorrow is the target variable to predict. It answers the crucial question: will it rain the next day? (Yes or No).**
